meta.title: Creating a Key
meta.description: How to create a Key in Sequelize Model

body:
Creating a Key

  • The Async/Await method
const result = await database.create({ key: "test", value: 1 });
console.log(result);
  • The .then() method
database
    .create({ key: "test", value: 1 })
    .then((result) => console.log(result))
    .catch(console.error);
